title: Building for sale in Panchikawatha - Maradana Rd
details:
Here’s your opportunity to buy a prime piece of real estate bearing 15.36 perches in the heart of Colombo!
A four-story building facing the Panchikawatte - Maradana main road with a total area of 8400 sq.ft.

An ideal location for:
• A financial institution such as a bank
• A service-oriented establishment
• A business hotel
• A shopping complex
• Showroom or office space

Principals Only.
Call now for property inquiry or to arrange a property inspection,
